name: Exemptions
text: [§136-5]  Exemptions.  Sections 136-3 and 136-4 shall not apply to any hand-held laser devices used in a recreational activity commonly referred to as "laser tag", and which activity is offered for a fee by an amusement or recreation facility, provided that the devices shall be collected by the operator of the facility following their use. [L 1999, c 94, pt of §1]
